name: reactjs-scaffolding
description: 1. Create application folders     - `public`     - `src` 2. Crete `index.hmtl` entry point of the reactjs application 3. Initialize npm 4. Added initial rulos to .gitignore 5. Install babel     > `npm install --save-dev @babel/core @babel/cli @babel/preset-env @babel/preset-react`
